net.jawr.web.resource.bundle

Interface JoinableResourceBundle

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CompositeResourceBundle, JoinableResourceBundleImpl, JoinableResourceOrphanBundleImpl

    public interface JoinableResourceBundle
    Represents a group of related resources which will be referred to by a single name.
    Author:
    Jordi Hernández Sellés, Ibrahim Chaehoi

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String LICENSES_FILENAME
      The licencing file name
      static String SORT_FILE_NAME
      The sorting file name

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean belongsToBundle(String itemPath)
      Determines if an item path belongs to the bundle.
      String getAlternateProductionURL()
      If set, it will force the tag libraries to render a static URL in production mode.
      String getBundleDataHashCode(String variantKey)
      Returns the bundle data hashcode
      ResourceBundlePostProcessor getBundlePostProcessor()
      Get the postprocesor to use once all files are joined.
      String getBundlePrefix()
      Returns the bundle prefix
      List<JoinableResourceBundle> getDependencies()
      Returns the bundle dependencies
      String getExplorerConditionalExpression()
      For bundles to be included for IE only within a conditional comment, this method returns the expression to use.
      String getId()
      Returns the ID for this bundle.
      InclusionPattern getInclusionPattern()
      Get the InclusionPattern to determine when/if this bundle should be included with current configuration.
      List<BundlePath> getItemDebugPathList()
      Returns an ordered list with all the items pertaining to this bundle.
      List<BundlePath> getItemDebugPathList(Map<String,String> variants)
      Returns for the debug mode an ordered list with all the items pertaining to this bundle, with the variations corresponding to the specified variant key.
      List<BundlePath> getItemPathList()
      Returns an ordered list with all the items pertaining to this bundle.
      List<BundlePath> getItemPathList(Map<String,String> variants)
      Returns an ordered list with all the items pertaining to this bundle, with the variations corresponding to the specified variant key.
      Set<String> getLicensesPathList()
      Returns a set with the license files to include with this bundle.

      Returns the bundle name

      Get the postprocessor to use in resources before adding them to the bundle

      Get the URL prefix for this Bundle.

      Returns the list of variant keys.

      Returns the map of variants by type for this bundle.

      Returns true if the bundle if composite

    • Method Detail

      • getName

        String getName()
        Returns the bundle name
        Returns:
        the bundle name

      • getId

        String getId()
        Returns the ID for this bundle. The URL, which will identify the bundle. It will normally end with .js or .css, since it will be used to refer to the bundle in URLs.
        Returns:
        the ID for this bundle

      • isComposite

        boolean isComposite()
        Returns true if the bundle if composite
        Returns:
        true if the bundle if composite

      • getInclusionPattern

        Get the InclusionPattern to determine when/if this bundle should be included with current configuration.
        Returns:
        the InclusionPattern

        Sets the mappings, which should be used for the bundle
        Parameters:
        mappings - the mapping of the resources of the bundle

      • getBundleDataHashCode

        String getBundleDataHashCode(String variantKey)
        Returns the bundle data hashcode
        Parameters:
        variantKey - the variant key
        Returns:
        the bundle data hashcode

      • setBundleDataHashCode

        void setBundleDataHashCode(String variantKey,
                         String bundleDataHashCode)
        Set the hashcode of the string representing the bundled files. Used to generate an automatic version url prefix.
        Parameters:
        the - variant key
        hashCode - the string representation of the hash code where the minus is replace by a "N" character.

      • getExplorerConditionalExpression

        String getExplorerConditionalExpression()
        For bundles to be included for IE only within a conditional comment, this method returns the expression to use.
        Returns:
        The expression for the conditional comment, or null if the bundle should be included for all browsers.

      • getVariants

        Map<String,VariantSet> getVariants()

        the map of variants by type for this bundle.
